meanings.definition: A shrub of the rose family with peeling bark.
meanings.sent1: The ninebark in the garden has beautiful peeling bark.
meanings.sent2: I collected some fallen ninebark to use in a craft project.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the ninebark as a disguise during hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the forest, bouncing off the ninebark trees.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight danced on the ninebark, creating a mesmerizing pattern.

meanings.definition: The bark of the ninebark shrub.
meanings.sent1: The texture of the ninebark bark is rough and peeling.
meanings.sent2: The birds found shelter in the dense ninebark bark.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel painted the ninebark bark with colorful patterns.
meanings.sent4: The moonlight cast eerie shadows on the gnarled ninebark bark.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the ninebark bark filled the air with a sweet fragrance.
